about_the_game:
Forged Into History: Speedway Odyssey is an arcade motorbike racing game that lets you take part in an individual fight for the championship in the top league of a speedway competition. Compete over 10 career seasons and prove that you are the true champion.

In Speedway Odyssey players will see their avatar from a top-down view in a 2D setting on a set of varied round and oval tracks. Your competition for each new game start will be a group of randomly generated AI players of varied difficulty levels.

The game allows for up to 4 players to play locally on a single computer. All game modes (single race, single tournament and career) can be played in such a way (for local multiplayer either a keyboard that has capability of supporting multiple buttons pressed at the same time or extra controllers are required).

Earn your title and don't let other pretenders take it away from you. Show that you are the true legend of speedway!

short_description: Welcome to the world of speedway racing. Speedway Odyssey offers you a chance to compete in the battle for championship at the top tier of a speedway competition. Can you earn the title of champion? And if you do, can you defend it?
